title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\TextToSpeechSettings
name: TextToSpeechSettings
description:
Instructs the speech synthesizer on how to generate the output audio content.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.TextToSpeechSettings

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.enable_text_to_speech
params.description: Optional. Indicates whether text to speech is enabled. Even when this field is false, other settings in this proto are still retained.

params.name: data.output_audio_encoding
params.description: Required. Audio encoding of the synthesized audio content.

params.name: data.sample_rate_hertz
params.description: Optional. The synthesis sample rate (in hertz) for this audio. If not provided, then the synthesizer will use the default sample rate based on the audio encoding. If this is different from the voice's natural sample rate, then the synthesizer will honor this request by converting to the desired sample rate (which might result in worse audio quality).

params.name: data.synthesize_speech_configs
params.description: Optional. Configuration of how speech should be synthesized, mapping from language (https://cloud.google.com/dialogflow/docs/reference/language) to SynthesizeSpeechConfig.
